name: Outbreak Complete
description: Complete campaign Episode 1: Outbreak on Normal difficulty.

name: Recombination Complete
description: Complete campaign Episode 2: Recombination on Normal difficulty.

name: Outbreak Master
description: Earn all the expert medals in Episode 1: Outbreak.

name: Recombination Master
description: Earn all the expert medals in Episode 2: Recombination.

name: Novice Challenges Complete
description: Complete all the Beginner Scenarios in Combat Scenario mode.

name: Intermediate Challenges Complete
description: Complete all the Intermediate Scenarios in Combat Scenario mode.

name: Expert Challenges Complete
description: Complete all the Advanced Scenarios in Combat Scenario mode.

name: Master Puzzle Challenges Complete
description: Complete all the Expert Scenarios in Combat Scenario mode.

name: Master Versus Challenges Complete
description: Complete all the Master Scenarios in Combat Scenario mode.

name: Hot Streak
description: Win 5 games in a row in Ranked Play.

name: Unstoppable
description: Win 8 games in a row in Ranked Play.

name: Legendary
description: Win 10 games in a row in Ranked Play.

name: Honorable Victory
description: Win a Ranked Play, Casual Match, or Master Bot game.

name: 10 Honorable Victories
description: Win 10 Ranked Play, Casual Match, or Master Bot games.

name: 20 Honorable Victories
description: Win 20 Ranked Play, Casual Match, or Master Bot games.

name: 50 Honorable Victories
description: Win 50 Ranked Play, Casual Match, or Master Bot games.

name: 100 Honorable Victories
description: Win 100 Ranked Play, Casual Match, or Master Bot games.

name: 200 Honorable Victories
description: Win 200 Ranked Play, Casual Match, or Master Bot games.

name: 500 Honorable Victories
description: Win 500 Ranked Play, Casual Match, or Master Bot games.

name: 1000 Honorable Victories
description: Win 1000 Ranked Play, Casual Match, or Master Bot games.

name: Warning: This One Is Hard
description: Defeat Master Bot Honorably with a handicap of 5 gold.

name: Blitz Wits
description: Defeat Master Bot Honorably with the time control set to 12 seconds per turn or less.

name: Bullet Boldness
description: Win a bullet (6 seconds per turn) game in Ranked Play.

name: The Kappa Challenge
description: Win five Honorable Master Bot games with the time control set to 3 seconds per turn or less.

name: Eventful Game
description: Win an Event Mode game.

name: You Are Not Alone
description: Become mutual friends with another player.

name: Friendly Gamer
description: Finish a friendly game with another player.

name: Secret Fan
description: Follow another player and observe them playing a game.

name: Super Spectator
description: Observe a top live game from the main menu.

name: Second Look
description: Watch one of your own replays.

name: The Code Is The Key
description: Watch another player's replay by entering a replay code.

name: Flair Up
description: Equip 3 Badges.

name: Daily Dose
description: Obtain all three Daily Bonuses rewards in one day.

name: Platinum Player
description: Start a Platinum Ticket in Ranked Play.

name: Omnipotence
description: Obtain an Omnipower Core.

name: Mysterious Card
description: Obtain a certain dark-colored rectangular object.

name: Armory Jackpot
description: Bring a Power Core to the Armory and reveal four red cards in your first five flips.

name: I Want It All
description: Flip over at least ten cards in a single Armory session.

name: Loonark Pls
description: Have a score of exactly 99 in the Armory after opening a Power Core.

name: Never Lucky
description: Achieve a feat of truly horrible luck.

name: Prismatic Power
description: Win a Prismatic reward by uncovering six white keys.

name: Potent Infusion
description: Upgrade an Emote to level 100.

name: Architect
description: Discover 50 Blueprints.

name: Check Out These Skins
description: Collect every skin in a skin collection and view it in the skin browser.

name: But... How?
description: Lose to Pacifist Bot.

name: Dressed For Success
description: Have non-default skins equipped for all Random Set units in a Ranked Play game.

name: Swift Victory
description: Defeat Basic Bot Honorably by destroying all enemy units by turn 10.

name: Who Needs ABCs
description: Defeat Master Bot Honorably without ever buying an Animus, Blastforge, or Conduit.

name: Trick Shot
description: Snipe a Gauss Cannon with Apollo.

name: Snowstorm
description: Freeze 20 or more health worth of units in one turn.

name: Executioner
description: Win a Ranked Play game in which you dealt at least 150 total damage.

name: But There Are Only Ten
description: Attack with at least 20 Gauss Cannons on one turn.

name: So Much Defense
description: Block with at least 60 health worth of units on one turn.

name: Superior Army Composition
description: Control 20 different units on one turn.

name: Become Legendary
description: Build three 1-supply units on the same turn.

name: Maximum Amporilla
description: Attack with at least four Amporillas and ten Tarsiers on one turn.

name: Laser Show
description: Deal 25 or more damage with an Antima Comet in one turn.

name: Rhino Perfection
description: Deal 20 damage with Rhinos in one game.

name: The Bone Drone Zone
description: Create at least 20 Ossified Drones in one game.

name: Deadeye Ranger
description: Snipe 10 or more Drones using Deadeye Operatives in one game.

name: Close Call
description: Win a Ranked Play game with 20 or less health worth of units remaining.

name: Comeback King
description: Defeat Adept Bot Honorably without clicking any Drones on your first turn.

name: Rush Master
description: Defeat Master Bot Honorably by purchasing an Animus or Blastforge on your first turn.

name: Dragon Sisters
description: Click Tia Thurnax and Vai Mauronax on the same turn.

name: Millionaire
description: Produce one million Gold in Honorable games.

name: Century Club
description: Buy 100 Centurions.

name: Tank Commander
description: Buy 200 Chieftains.

name: Cerberus Lord
description: Buy 500 Hellhounds.

name: Doomed Economy
description: Buy 1000 Doomed Drones.

name: Bringer of the Void
description: Click Zemora Voidbringer 333 times.

name: New Contender
description: Unlock Ranked Play.

name: Neophyte
description: Reach Tier II in Ranked Play.

name: Cadet
description: Reach Tier III in Ranked Play.

name: Apprentice
description: Reach Tier IV in Ranked Play.

name: Swarm Shepherd
description: Reach Tier V in Ranked Play.

name: Guardian
description: Reach Tier VI in Ranked Play.

name: Swarmwielder
description: Reach Tier VII in Ranked Play.

name: Officer
description: Reach Tier VIII in Ranked Play.

name: Captain of the Swarm
description: Reach Tier IX in Ranked Play.

name: Prismata Master
description: Achieve the title of Master in Ranked Play.

name: Fully Synced
description: Attack with 10 Iso Kronuses on the same turn.

name: Stream In My Sights
description: View a live Twitch stream from within Prismata.

name: Exact Vengeance
description: Build at least 6 Venge Cannons on the same turn.

name: Defender
description: Buy 50 Walls.

name: Gaussite Tycoon
description: Produce 10,000 Gaussite in Honorable games.

name: Metallurgist
description: Produce 10,000 Behemium in Honorable games.

name: Minister of Energy
description: Produce 25,000 Energy in Honorable games.

name: Biotechnologist
description: Produce 10,000 Replicase in Honorable games.

name: Crank It Up To 11
description: Win a Ranked Play game that features 11 random units.

name: Third Possible Outcome
description: Achieve a drawn game in Ranked Play mode.

name: Ampo Shmampo
description: Clear the Amporilla Challenge mission in the Concept Pack in Puzzle mode without buying an Amporilla.

name: But Fear Itself
description: Defeat Fearless Bot Honorably without attacking before Turn 10.

name: Crush Those Casuals
description: Win 25 Casual Match games.

name: Final Countdown
description: Clear the Countdown mission in the Concept Pack in Puzzle mode without losing any Drones or building a Wall.

name: Quick Dispatch
description: Clear the second phase of the Squarewave mission in at most 9 turns on Normal difficulty.

name: No Time To Waste
description: In The Solar Fields mission, breach the enemy defenses by the end of turn 9 on Normal difficulty.

name: Optimal Blocking
description: Complete the Scrap and Scrutiny mission without losing any Hellhounds on Normal difficulty.

name: Concept Pack Complete
description: Complete all puzzles in the Concept Pack in Puzzle mode.

name: Pacifist
description: Get punished for your empathy.

name: Botstreak
description: Win 5 Honourable games in a row against Master Bot.

name: They Didn't Stand a Chance
description: In the Tandem mission, defeat the entire final wave of enemies in a single turn on Normal difficulty.

name: Defense Budget Savings
description: In the Five-Cycle mission, destroy the enemy Overheat Ray before it fires three times on Normal difficulty.

name: But I Survived
description: Use a meat shield to deal with your problems.

name: No Thanks
description: Decline a free gift.

name: Bomb Defused
description: In the Guardian Rube mission, destroy the Armored Plasma Bomb before it detonates on Normal difficulty.

name: Massive Destruction
description: In the Cargo mission, destroy all of the enemy Conduits on Normal difficulty.

name: There's No Escape
description: In the AFS Concordia mission, destroy the Xantho Talos before it escapes on Normal difficulty.

name: No Thanks, Again
description: Accept a free gift, but decline to use it.

name: I Didn't Do It
description: He did it to himself.

name: Keystone Complete
description: Complete campaign Episode 3: Keystone on Normal difficulty.

name: Keystone Master
description: Earn all the expert medals in Episode 3: Keystone.

name: Prismata Miniatures Pack Complete
description: Complete all puzzles in the 'Prismata Miniatures' chapter of Challenge Pack 1.

name: Overheat Defense Pack Complete
description: Complete all puzzles in the 'Overheat Defense' chapter of Challenge Pack 1.

name: The Onslaught Pack Complete
description: Complete all puzzles in the 'Onslaught' chapter of Challenge Pack 1.
